CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL( Priority__c , 'Very Low'), 'arrow down lowGreen', If(ISPICKVAL( Priority__c , 'Low'), 'arrow down green', If(ISPICKVAL( Priority__c , 'Medium'), 'arrow up yellow', If(ISPICKVAL( Priority__c , 'High'), 'arrow up orange', 'arrow up red' ) )) )
CustomField.label: Arrow To Show
